org.openstack4j.model.heat.builder

Interface SoftwareConfigBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buildable.Builder<SoftwareConfigBuilder,SoftwareConfig>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeatSoftwareConfig.Builder

    public interface SoftwareConfigBuilder
extends Buildable.Builder<SoftwareConfigBuilder,SoftwareConfig>
    A builder which produces a SoftwareConfig object
    Author:
    Jeremy Unruh
